ai_sprite.name: camp_gate
ai_sprite.dialog: I came with Ammon, Himni, and others to preach to the Lamanites. But they imprisoned me! Perhaps you can persuade them to let me go?

dialog.text: Thank you so much for freeing me! I would be happy to fight alongside you.

prompt.next_dialog: Oh, really? Hmm. I was fully expecting you to say yes. Uh...I didn't think this far ahead. I guess I don't know what to do now. Well, I kind of got used to this prison. It's suprisingly comfortable. I suppose I'll just relax here. Let me know if you change your mind.

ai_sprite.name: lamanites
ai_sprite.dialog: This is the city of Middoni. We're still developing, but before you know it we'll be as big as the city of Nephi.

dialog.text: Southeast of here is one of the Lamanite capitals, Nephi.
Southeast of here is one of the Lamanite capitals, Nephi. It is the last city with Nephite sympathizers, but the Lamanite King has been preparing to meet you. Be cautious.
